Reviews.Title: Great Job!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Tomlinson
Reviews.Content: This item was a gift and actually had more features than I was expecting.  I will use you again.  The holidays are just around the corner.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: LizNYC
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter and its great only thing I wish this product offered a memory card along with purchase. Other than that its great!

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed..
Reviews.Author: S. Perkins
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this camera. I had to keep the camera very still or my pictures were blundered. I had the stabilizer on, but I still didn't see a lot of difference.
